author: Craig Ueltzen
comment: Much better than stock app. Looks great and professional on a watch screen unlike the ugly OEM app. Has lap times too, which the Wear one lacks. The icon looks cartoonish only on Google play, looks good in the Wear Mini Launcher's drawer.
title: Looks and works great on Zen Watch.

author: Derek Steelman
comment: If it was treated as a notification card that didn't disappear when the screen times out it would be great otherwise its useless to me as a runner since it will time out between my split intervals.
title: Need to be a notification card

author: Jason Garozzo
comment: You can't put it in the background. Fix that and you have 5 stars.
title: Needs 1 more feature

author: Anton Stupnitskiy
comment: Make the dim option and you have 5 stars
